content: in this step-by-step guide you ll learn how to create a beautiful african flower granny square cardigan from start to finish whether you re new to crochet or looking for a fun project this tutorial is perfect for you first you crochet all the granny squares and then sew them together and then you crochet the edge around the vest video see youtube + media title 1 language english & dutch & german pattern to make this cardigan you can download the pdf after payment size s/m length 64 cm 25 long version width 49 cm 19 5 l/xl length 74 cm 29 width 59 cm 23 5 materials scheepjes woolwise or any yarn suitable for crochet hook 4 mm crochet hook 4 mm scissors needle difficulty beginners 1 https //youtu be/zqdqoq5bifo
